answer: VLBI can image large fields-of-view with sub-mJy detection limits, providing background for extending our understanding of cosmologically distant sources (astro-ph/0102037).
explanation: This paper discusses the capability of VLBI to image large fields-of-view with sub-mJy detection limits, which is relevant to understanding cosmologically distant sources.
evidence_quote: VLBI now has the capability of imaging relatively large fields-of-view
